091EA8DD.Line13.6D03F: All I can do is help the Wanderer and Neyrelle avoid the fate of Rathma—and everyone else who tried and failed to overcome our flawed nature.

27FCB7D0.Line7.6D03F: But is there any truth to Lilith’s vision? This mad idea that we can escape the Eternal Conflict?

6F2A2F5B.Line11.6D03F: Once we are back with Neyrelle, we will find a way. We have to.

8E083E4E.Line5.6D03F: These are not questions befitting an old man, and I don’t have much time left. This struggle is not mine anymore.

A313225F.Line15.6D03F: Or will we walk the same path of all children who rebel against their parents? So often we simply become them.

C1F13152.Line9.6D03F: Now we are truly alone. The creators of Sanctuary, angel and demon, father and mother, are dead.

F413C4CC.Line3.6D03F: They made us in their image. Their conflict is a part of us. And it always will be.
